title: 102. Your Desires + Why they are Important
description:
Happy Thursday! 

This week is allll about desire. Childhood trauma doesn't allow much wiggle room for creativity, desire, and dreaming up what we actually want to do in our lives. Listen to today's episode where I break down why your desires are important and so so so worthy.

Psssst if you would like to enroll in the self-study version of Self Love Over Codependency, you can enroll here, we would love to have you! 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
